title: Sweet and sour sauce
ingredients: ['2 dessertspoons vegetable oil', '2 cloves garlic, finely chopped', '1 teaspoon chilli powder', '120ml tomato ketchup', '180ml cold water', '1 dessertspoon white wine vinegar', 'salt to taste', '1 dessertspoon sugar, or to taste', '1 dessertspoon cornflour, mixed with a little water til dissolved']
